room.description: A sturdy wooden cabin sits on the top of a small hill. A tingle of magic and power surrounds the entire house.
room.title: PeEll's House

room.description: You enter a grand yard reaching out into the distance in every direction. To the west is the entrance to PeEll's House, to the north is a grand forest.
room.title: PeEll's Yard

room.description: Inside this clean, well organized house, there is elegant leather furniture. Against the east wall there is a stone fireplace. To the north one can see the kitchen, to the west is a storage room, and upstairs are the bedrooms.
room.title: Inside the House

room.description: Change the title of this room by typing "rtitle <new title>". Enter the description of this room by typing "rdescription <description>".
room.title: Storage Room

room.description: Change the title of this room by typing "rtitle <new title>". Enter the description of this room by typing "rdescription <description>".
room.title: A Freshly Created Room

room.title: A Freshly Created Room

item.name: new item shiny object
item.long: A shiny object floats where you left it.
